PlaceholderDesc_Npc_HasSkills_Start: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the npc has skills. Must be closed with Npc_HasSkills_End.
PlaceholderDesc_Npc_HasSkills_End: End of the content that will only be rendered if the npc has skills.
PlaceholderDesc_Npc_Skills: Skills of the npc. The skill list template will be used for this.
PlaceholderDesc_Skills_Start: Start of the skill list. The list must be closed with Skills_End. Attributes of the skill can be used with the FlexField placeholders but using CurSkill_ instead of FlexField_.
PlaceholderDesc_CurSkill_Index: Zero based index of the current skill in the skill list.
